purpose: Highlight the impact of COVID-19 on workplace diversity and flexibility.
title: COVID-19 placed us at a cross roads

bullets.text: Companies agree that remote work will help hire and retain more diverse employees
Employees say remote work can provide the flexibility they need to have work/life balance
In 2019 flexibility was the top challenge raised by employees
Women who are considering leaving the workforce or downshifting their careers
Potential number of women who could exit the workforce
could be erased in one year

content_zones.left: Optimism that remote work can improve flexibility and diversity...
content_zones.right: ... but big challenges that put at risk the progress earned
